Class DialPointer.Pin

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jfree.chart.plot.dial.AbstractDialLayer

    Enclosing class:
    DialPointer

    public static class DialPointer.Pin
extends DialPointer
    A dial pointer that draws a thin line (like a pin).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
